name: YAHMAN Add-ons
author: YAHMAN

sections.description: Page views,Google Adsense,Analytics,Social,Profile,Table of contents,Related Posts,sitemap,SEO,JSON-LD structured data,Open Graph protocol(OGP),Blog card,Twitter timeline,Facebook timeline,Carousel Slider etc…
sections.installation:
1. Upload yahman-add-ons folder into your /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. You can change the default settings and more under Settings > YAHMAN Add-ons
